<script type="text/javascript"><!--
$('.ajaxcolumnen').click(function() {
	var object_id=$(this).attr('id');
	$.ajax({
		url: 'index.php?route=catalog/product/setatten&token=<?php echo $token; ?>',
		type: 'get',
		data: {object_id:object_id},
		dataType: 'html',
		success: function(html) {
			if(html!=''){				
				$('#'+object_id).html(html);
			}
		}
	});
});
//--></script>
